title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Answers to popular questions about our services

booking.question: How to book an appointment?
booking.answer: You can book an appointment through the form on our website{{phone, phone}}, by calling {{phone}}{{/phone}}{{instagram, instagram}}, or by messaging us on Instagram {{instagram}}{{/instagram}}. We will contact you to confirm the appointment.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept cash and card payments (Visa, MasterCard, American Express). Payment is made after the service.

cancellation.question: Can I cancel or reschedule my appointment?
cancellation.answer: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule your appointment no later than 24 hours before the scheduled time. Cancellations less than 24 hours in advance may incur a 50% fee of the service cost.

materials.question: What materials do you use?
materials.answer: We use only certified premium materials from leading global brands. All pigments are hypoallergenic and safe for health.

certificates.question: Do your masters have certificates?
certificates.answer: Yes, all our masters have international certificates and regularly attend professional development courses.

preparation.question: Is preparation required before the procedure?
preparation.answer: Yes, some procedures require preparation. We provide detailed recommendations when booking.

contraindications.question: Are there contraindications for procedures?
contraindications.answer: Yes, each procedure has its contraindications. Main ones: pregnancy, lactation, acute inflammatory processes, blood diseases, oncology. Consultation with a master is mandatory before the procedure.

guarantee.question: Do you provide a guarantee for services?
guarantee.answer: Yes, we guarantee the quality of all our services. If you are not satisfied with the result, contact us within 7 days and we will find a solution.

loyalty.question: Do you have a loyalty program?
loyalty.answer: Yes, we have an accumulative loyalty program. After each visit, you receive bonuses that can be used to pay for future visits.

weekends.question: Are you open on weekends?
weekends.answer: Yes, we work 7 days a week. {{weekdays, weekdays}}On weekdays {{weekdays}}{{/weekdays}}{{weekends, weekends}}, on weekends {{weekends}}{{/weekends}}.

gift.question: Can I gift a service certificate?
gift.answer: Yes, we offer gift certificates for any amount or specific services. Contact us to arrange a certificate.

location.question: Where is your salon located?
location.answer: We are located at: {{address}}. You can find detailed directions on the Contacts page.

cta.title: Didn't find the answer to your question?
cta.description: Contact us and we will gladly answer all your questions
